game.name: Tomato Jones 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tomato Jones 2 is the sequel to the fun-filled Tomato Jones, available on Steam.Join a red tomato in a silly hat as he tries to be a cool tomb raider, rolling and jumping across maps. Help him find treasures in the mystic castle, or watch him meet a variety of unfortunate fates!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tomato Jones 2 is the sequel to the fun-filled Tomato Jones, available on Steam.Join a red tomato in a silly hat as he tries to be a cool tomb raider, rolling and jumping across maps. Help him find treasures in the mystic castle, or watch him meet a variety of unfortunate fates!

reviewHighlights.text: 와우 친구들 토마토 아저씨야, 자 오늘은 게임을 할때 이렇게 하면 안된다는것을 잘 알려주려고 이런 정보를 가지고 왔어. 여러분들이 게임할때, 이런게임을 하면 이렇쿵저렇쿵 한 근육들이 놀라게되어있어. 그때 다른 갓겜을 하면 이거 좋아 정말 좋아. 좋았어! 오늘은 여기까지...
